name: Recoil (itch) (BUNN1E5)
description:
Controls:

Left Mouse Button : Fire/Select

Right Mouse Button : Pause

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

Two buttons? Perfect for LD34! Wait a second...

Ehhh what else?... So I changed the main game mechanic from seen in the unfinished version. I had 3 hours left.

I spent way to much time on modeling, funny how I didn't actually use any of them ;(

Music: By my friend here https://soundcloud.com/qualico
